entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is a bearded giant who leapt from the sofa and drew a battered pink umbrella.

entities.name: uncle vernon
entities.description: Uncle Vernon is a person who was threatened by Hagrid with an umbrella.

entities.name: vol - sorry - i mean you-know-who
entities.description: You-Know-Who is the one who tried to kill Harry and disappeared.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a person with hundreds of questions to ask.

relationships.description: Hagrid threatened Uncle Vernon with an umbrella.
